price: Ẹ má ṣe kígbe (fún ìrànlọ́wọ́) ní òní. Dájúdájú kò sí ẹni tí ó máa ràn yín lọ́wọ́ lọ́dọ̀ Wa.
arabic: لَا تَجۡـَٔرُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ إِنَّكُم مِّنَّا لَا تُنصَرُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: lā tajarū al-yawma innakum minnā lā tunṣarūna
